Code.Name: Heat sensitive
Code.Description: The object is heat sensitive.

Code.Name: Store in dry environment
Code.Description: The object must be stored in dry environment.

Code.Name: Stacked
Code.Description: The identified item is, or can be stacked.

Code.Name: Mooring to be arranged
Code.Description: Request to arrange boatmen to (de)moor the vessel at the berth.

Code.Name: Mooring arranged
Code.Description: Information that the boatmen to (de)moor the vessel at the berth are already arranged.

Code.Name: Pilotage to be arranged
Code.Description: Request to arrange the pilotage for the vessel.

Code.Name: Pilotage arranged
Code.Description: Information that pilotage for the vessel is already arranged.

Code.Name: Berth towage to be arranged
Code.Description: Request to arrange the towage for the vessel to/from the berth in the port.

Code.Name: Disposal of waste to be arranged
Code.Description: Request to arrange the disposal of waste.

Code.Name: Transshipment to be arranged
Code.Description: The consignment has to be transshipped.

Code.Name: Refrigeration required
Code.Description: Item must be refrigerated for proper handling.

Code.Name: Refrigeration not required
Code.Description: Item does not need to be refrigerated for proper handling.

Code.Name: Destroy
Code.Description: The identified goods are to be destroyed according to specified instructions.

Code.Name: Keep frozen
Code.Description: The identified products is frozen and should be kept frozen.

Code.Name: Hang garment
Code.Description: The identified product(s) should be handled as a hanging garment.

Code.Name: Labelling required
Code.Description: The identified product is/are to be labelled.

Code.Name: Keep in lying position
Code.Description: The identified product(s) should be kept in a lying position.

Code.Name: Move according to instructions
Code.Description: The identified product is to be moved according to instructions specified.

Code.Name: Pack according to instructions
Code.Description: The identified product is to be packed according to the instructions provided.

Code.Name: Prepare for shipment
Code.Description: The identified product(s) is(are) to be prepared for shipment.

Code.Name: Reserve according to instructions
Code.Description: Reserve identified goods according to specified instructions.

Code.Name: Light sensitive
Code.Description: The product is sensitive to light.

Code.Name: Transit or cross docking delivery required
Code.Description: The identified product is to be delivered via a transit or cross docking facility.

Code.Name: Unpacking required
Code.Description: The identified product is to be unpacked from the identified package.

Code.Name: Keep in upright/standing position
Code.Description: The identified product should be kept in an upright or standing position.
